metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1636 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in OpenStack Barbican containers. This vulnerability is only applicable to deployments that utilize an all-in-one configuration. Barbican containers share the same CGROUP, USER, and NET namespace with the host system and other OpenStack services. If any service is compromised, it could gain access to the data transmitted to and from Barbican.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-10-26, no details if this is a Red Hat specific issue or if it also applies to Debian/Ubuntu, see Red Hat bug

criterions.comment: barbican package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-10-26').
